General.Name: Hunan Friendship&Apollo Commercial Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Friendship&Apollo Commercial Co.,Ltd. operates department stores. The also operates outlets, shopping malls, specialty stores, and online shopping platforms, as well as leases properties. It operates 15 stores and properties under the Friendship Store ab Pavilion, Friendship Mall, Apollo Commercial Plaza, Changsha Youa Outlets, Chenzhou Youa International Plaza, Changde Youa International Plaza, Shaoyang Youa International Plaza, Youhao Overseas Shopping, You Awei Store, and You Ago Shopping names. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No. 9, Chaoyang Front Street, Changsha, China, 410001
